box2D.collision.B2RayCastInput

type
class
Specifies a segment for use with RayCast functions.

Constructor

new(?p1 : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2, ?p2 : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2, ?maxFraction : Float)

Instance Variables

maxFraction : Float

Truncate the ray to reach up to this fraction from p1 to p2

p1 : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

The start point of the ray

p2 : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

The end point of the ray
